original_title: Metallica: Live at Rock im Park 2012
overview: Band name: Metallica Date: June 1, 2012 Venue: Rock Im Park Location: Nuremberg, Germany Tour name: European Summer Vacation Event: Rock Im Park  Track listing: Hit the Lights  Master of Puppets No Remorse (Missing) For Whom the Bell Tolls (Missing) Hell and Back (Missing) The Struggle Within (Missing) My Friend of Misery The God That Failed Of Wolf and Man Nothing Else Matters  Through the Never (Missing) Don't Tread On Me (Missing) Wherever I May Roam  The Unforgiven Holier Than Thou Sad But True Enter Sandman Fight Fire with Fire One Seek & Destroy
title: Metallica: Live at Rock im Park 2012
